Security.comm: Very easy to pick, even for beginners.

cont.entity_a: Making it insecure. Not suitable for learning lock-picking due to its simplicity. Can be bypassed easily with minimal tools. Not secure enough for high-value items.
Build quality is decent for a very inexpensive lock. Lightweight and feels flimsy. Not recommended for outdoor use due to susceptibility to rust.
cont.entity_b: Not durable; broke after minimal use. Affordable price but lacks durability. Not suitable for outdoor use due to weather sensitivity.

Use.comm: Suitable for keeping honest people honest.

cont.entity_b: Good for low-security applications like gym lockers. Suitable for minor tasks.
Available in various colors for easy identification.
